casebody.data:
STERLING NATIONAL BANK as successor by merger to Astoria Bank, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Stephen A. RUCCIO and Margaret M. Ruccio, his wife, Defendants-Petitioners. C-924 September Term 2018
082420 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 3, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003307-17 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
